8.14.21  3:45 am   Hey Bill, I love your videos and I was wondering something. Are you going to do any more videos like hi, i'm steve

     or are you just doing music videos like here comes the sun and money?

8.14.21  12:35 am   how do you express joy when songwriting? or emotions in general?

     i sometimes listen to all your songs on repeat while walking, and for me, it's the chorus (and lead-in) of i'm a princess that, more than any other of your songs, fills me with so much joy that i break into a run. the trippy rhythm before the 2nd and final chorus feels like pushing against the ground at the start of a sprint.

8.13.21  9:19 pm   hi bill. i originally thought the lyrics to JoJo - "Too little too late"" at the end of the chorus were "And be real, it doesn't hurt anyway...", and as a result that part of the song always hit me like a truck and felt so much more meaningful. but recently i discovered that the actual lyrics are "To be real, it doesn't matter anyway" and now i'm sad because i can't unhear those very inferior lyrics.

     Have you ever had a similar scenario where you misheard the lyrics to a song and once you found out the actual lyrics, you preferred the lyrics you originally heard?
